entranceTest.testCriteria: Criteria varies each year based on performance and merit

process.title: Purchase Prospectus
process.description: Buy the admission prospectus form from school office for â‚¹500
process.details: Visit school office during working hours to purchase the prospectus form

process.title: Fill Application
process.description: Complete the application form with all required details
process.details: Fill all sections carefully and attach required documents

process.title: Entrance Test
process.description: Appear for entrance test based on current class level
process.details: Test will be conducted for the class student is currently studying

process.title: Result & Registration
process.description: Check results and complete registration if qualified
process.details: Successful candidates proceed to next class admission

documents: Mark sheets of last attended class

importantNotes: Entrance test is mandatory for all classes except Pre-Primary
Test will be conducted for current class level, not desired class
Admission to next class depends on entrance test performance
All processes are conducted offline at school premises
Prospectus must be purchased before entrance test
Benefits and criteria may vary each academic year

fees.note: Fee structure varies based on class and performance in entrance test
